post.summary: bulk replace all attributes in specified layer

parameters.name: layerIDs
parameters.description: Specifies which layers contribute to the result, and in which order

parameters.name: atTime
parameters.description: Specify datetime, for which point in time to get the data; leave empty to use current time (https://www.newtonsoft.com/json/help/html/DatesInJSON.htm)
